about_the_game:
Holy Heroes is a cooperative game for one to four players, sharing the same screen on a single computer via keyboard and controllers. Players can choose from 9 distinct hero classes (Knight, Dwarf, Barbarian, Wizard, Cleric, Ninja, Necromancer, Paladin, and Archer) to explore diverse floors and biomes in pursuit of main or side missions. The game features 9 spheres of power (Air, Water, Earth, Fire, Life, Death, Magic, Mind, and Nature) that influence monsters, enchantments, and enhancements, along with a variety of items to equip and use.
In addition to multiple floors to explore with increasing difficulty, the game includes traps, weather changes, portals, guardians, lever systems, and other elements that constantly demand players' attention, keeping them engaged.
• Explore procedurally generated worlds, always different.
• Acquire weapons, armor, shields, accessories, and more.
• Discover your strategy by freely choosing your spells.
• Forge and reforge items to always be prepared for any adversity.
• Learn special skills and acquire professions.
• Complete side quests while exploring the main mission's labyrinths.
• Experience day and night cycles, facing storms, fogs, and other challenges.
• Avoid traps and discover secret passages.
• Upon leveling up, enhance your heroes by deciding where to allocate points.
• Navigate through over twenty floors with various branches and biomes.
• Each floor may contain multiple levels.
• Encounter diverse monsters per biome and floor, with many creatures to discover in each unique world.
• Play alone or with up to 3 friends by your side.
• Share gold and experience with your group, if desired.
• Configure quick actions with up to 6 game commands.
• Become a Sacred Hero!
• For a challenging experience, we recommend Nightmare mode.

In the demo, heroes are limited to level 3
